course_title: Adult/Gerontology Acute Care Nurse Practitioner Clinical Practicum I
course_description: This course will provide a clinical practice preceptorship with faculty oversight to develop skills in health assessment and physical exam, differential diagnosis, diagnostic reasoning and plan of care for individual episodic and chronic conditions.
prerequisites: NRSG 528 and NRSG 544 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 4114, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: C. Brockett, Status: Open
